Exittent.D1: Nothing like morning air to get the blood pumping! What a great morning for a hunt!
Exittent.D2: I wonder what the rest are up to...

Grave.D1: The stone reads "She who remembers the sacred places, the bodies of water, the origin.
Grave.D5: Coznac definitely needs your guidance now..

Ruslan.D1: Ah, good morning, Gulnaz. You're up early.
Ruslan.D3: Mornin' Ruslan. I guess I'm just excited to get my dagger back from the smith!
Ruslan.D4: Going out for a hunt seems to be the only thing that can take my mind off what has been going on lately...
Ruslan.D5: It is quite the predicament. Our tribe is in disarray, and instrumental magic isn't helping.
Ruslan.D6: I'm not a fan either... Can't you do something about it- being the Spirit Counselor and all?
Ruslan.D7: You know how it is with Aibek and I... He's obstinate. Only your grandma could ever get to him, spirits bless her.
Ruslan.D10: The spirits in this area, I can sense their malaise.
Ruslan.D11: We've been in this area for far too long.
Ruslan.D12: Magic may be sustaining us, but I fear that staying any longer might bring a blight.
Ruslan.D13: Not on my watch it's not.
Ruslan.D14: Hahaha... You've always displayed the same fiery ardour as your precursors.

Ruslan2.D1: I think I saw Serik up ahead. Why don't you chat with him instead?

Serik.D2: Uh, hey, muscle brain. Also- I like all animals equally. Not just birds.
Serik.D3: Uh-huh. So what're you up to?
Serik.D5: Well, that's better than participating in his magic classes.
Serik.D6: Oh spirits, I rather clean the stables for a month than attend ONE class.
Serik.D7: You are such a drama queen.
Serik.D9: Anyways, I have to get back to my chores.
Serik.D10: Sure you don't need any of my muscly assistance?

Serik3.D1: Boy. I wish I had a AAA sandwich.

Inzhu.D1: Well, well! If it isn't the lass herself! How goes the hunting?
Inzhu.D3: Maybe you should take up magic instead? It's surely much more effective than swinging a piece of metal around.
Inzhu.D4: NO way! I'm a beast with a sword.
Inzhu.D5: Plus, I'm not on board with the magic thing. It's shady, it's direspectful, and it's too good to be true.
Inzhu.D6: Hum, suit yourself. If you change your mind, Aibek's conducting lessons up ahead. We've got a bunch of carcasses for the instruments from the last hunt.
Inzhu.D8: Say what you will about Aibek, Gulnaz, but he is the Chieftan. People trust him, as I do.
Inzhu.D9: Well, Temir said she was looking for you. Why don't you go get your sword? She's at her hut to your right.
Inzhu.D10: Thanks. Let's debate the good of magic some other time.

Inzhu2.D1: Don't you have a piece of metal to swing around?
Inzhu2.D2: Don't you have a magic spell to fail?

Temir.D6: Give it a swing on those dummies over there, why don't you?

Serik4.D2: Those haystacks look pretty heavy, Serik.

Serik5.D1: Wow! Do those even weigh a thing to you?
Serik5.D3: Well, I'm going uphill to report to my dad. Do you wanna come with?
Serik5.D4: Sure, I've got some time to kill.

enter1-1.D1: I know you don't go out often, but what exactly are you gawking at?
enter1-1.D2: It's nothing! I just haven't been this far from the tribe before...
enter1-1.D3: You've got to be kidding, right?
enter1-1.D4: Is your sword alone really going to keep us safe from... whatever's out there?
enter1-1.D5: Oh, you HAVE to be kidding.
enter1-1.D6: I just lost my body, so really, I'm not very keen on losing any more of my livilhood. You know. Like dying?
enter1-1.D7: Listen to me, Serik. All my life, I've been gathering and hunting for game.
enter1-1.D8: I know everything there is to survive, and I know this place like the back of my hand!
Since we've been here for so long. Thanks to your oh-so-great dad.

desh1-1.D2: What! What is it!! Is it Bearguar?!!
desh1-1.D6: Keep it down! I don't know what it is, but if it's hostile, I'm ready.

defeated1-1.D3: Well, I don't doubt that we're still susceptible to death.

shoes21-1.D3: Serik, hold up! Spirits damn it!

pig1-1.D4: Okay. You don't want to upset me piggy.
pig1-1.D6: Spirits, shut up! You sound just like-

posession1-1.D1: Ah! I think? I may have just possessed that Lavapig??
posession1-1.D3: I.. I think I can do it again!
posession1-1.D5: I don't know! Is this ability not potentially useful?
posession1-1.D6: I need a moment to register..this whole thing.
posession1-1.D7: Well, I'm gonna give this another go.
